guide.p0: Attributes in Guardians of Adelia consists of primary attributes and elements.

table.mana: Maximum mana, used for casting skills
table.crit_chance: Chance to multiply your damage with critical damage
table.crit_damage: Base value is 150%, can be increased with some skills or gear sets.
table.ability_haste: Reduces cooldown of your skills. Formula: 100 / (100 + abilityHaste)

guide.p2: Every damage in Guardians of Adelia has an element type and they effect the calculation of total damage and defense. There are 5 types of elements in Guardians of Adelia.
